title: Statement by Minister for Foreign Affairs Margot Wallström on the terrorist attack in Ankara, Turkey, ...
text: ( Source : Ministry for Foreign Affairs of the Kingdom of Sweden ) I strongly condemn the attacks on peaceful demonstrations that took place today. I send my deepest sympathy to the many people who have lost family members and friends in the
